message: Welcome to the Weather Imp server.

/coords/:zip.get: Returns latitude and longitude coordinates from the zip code(:zip) provided.

/city/:lat/:lon.get: Returns the city that is at the latitude(:lat) and longitude(:lon) provided.

/current/:lat/:lon.get: Returns a json object with the current weather for the lattitude(:lat) and longitude(:lon) provided.

/three-day/:lat/:lon.get: Returns a json object with the three-day forecast for the lattitude(:lat) and longitude(:lon) provided
